component.name: Maverick Model 3D
component.summary: 3D model editor and animator for games

description.p: Maverick Model 3D is a 3D model editor that supports skeletal and vertex frame animations.

It supports several 3D model formats; Misfit Model 3D .MM3D, Wavefront .OBJ, Milkshape .MS3D, and Quake engine formats .MD2 and .MD3. There is export-only support for GoldSrc/Source .SMD and Inter-Quake Export .IQE.
